name: Mender's Strife: An 8-Bit Fantasy
description:
One young woman, Marah, stands against an encroaching epidemic, struggling to control newfound magical powers that threaten to either cleanse the outbreak or bring about the end of days.

---------------------------------------------

Hey there, and thanks for stopping by! This is the place you need to be to find out all the things about Mender’s Strife: An 8-Bit Fantasy, a new 8-bit mobile/PC-based RPG that’s currently in development.

Mender’s Strife has a bit of everything from old school gaming nostalgia-infused graphics to an awesome storyline, tons of humor, gorgeous music, kickass characters, weird characters, weird and kickass characters, and diverse, modern story themes that matter to not only us, but to the world around us.

The demo is currently available for free to download.

DEMO 2.0 is now released! Enjoy an upgraded experience!

New Features Include: Completely chip-tuned OST, enhanced battle and menu UI, enhanced battle experience with more skill options, fun bug fixes (yay!).
